product_overview: JobMatch AI is an intelligent job application assistant designed to streamline the entire job seeking process for active candidates. It automates LinkedIn profile import, resumes and cover letter creation with AI, job discovery with smart matching, application tracking, and account management, saving users significant time and improving their application quality and success rate.
core_goals: Automate the customization of job applications to save users time.
Provide AI-powered job matching with compatibility and skill gap analysis to increase application relevance.
Enable comprehensive tracking of job applications with status updates and smart follow-up recommendations.
Offer AI-driven resume and cover letter generation tailored to specific jobs.
Centralize job discovery through automated scraping and filtering from multiple job boards.
Support user account management with secure authentication, subscription plans, and usage limits.
key_features: LinkedIn OAuth integration and one-time profile import wizard for seamless user onboarding.
AI-powered resume editor with optimization suggestions and multiple format export (PDF, DOCX).
Job discovery interface with searchable, filterable job listings, compatibility scoring, and skill gap badges.
Application Generator to create tailored resumes and cover letters with multiple AI-generated variants and form-based editing.
Comprehensive Application Tracker with status lifecycle, follow-up reminders, interview and contact notes, and analytics dashboard.
Subscription and billing management including freemium Basic and paid Premium tiers, feature gating, and upgrade prompts.
Robust security features including 2FA, session management, and GDPR-compliant data export and deletion.
user_flow_summary: New user connects LinkedIn account via import wizard and imports profile data.
User views and edits their profile and master resume with AI optimization suggestions.
User browses and filters jobs with AI match scores and saves interesting jobs.
User initiates application generation for a selected job to produce customized resumes and cover letters.
User reviews, edits, and submits applications; applications are automatically tracked with status and follow-ups.
User manages application statuses, adds notes, schedules follow-ups, and reviews analytics to optimize job search.
User manages account settings including profile, security, privacy, and subscription plans with upgrade capability.
validation_criteria: Successful LinkedIn OAuth connection and profile data import with accurate mapping.
AI-generated resume and cover letter variants must be relevant, editable, and exportable.
Job listings should be searchable, filterable, and show accurate compatibility scores and skill gap information.
Application tracker must support full status lifecycle updates, bulk actions, and generate timely follow-up reminders.
Subscription limits enforced with clear user prompts and seamless upgrade process.
Security features, including 2FA and session management, operate reliably.
User data export and deletion comply with GDPR requirements.
Performance metrics meet target benchmarks for onboarding completion, application volume, and user retention.
